reviews.text: I really love this hotel, have been staying there a few times now.
reviews.title: Quirky

reviews.text: It s right in the hustle and bustle of Khao San Road in Bangkok, and it has a huge swimmingpool. I really like the design of the room, it has a bed on the floor and the bathroom is really nicely designed. There is a snackbar/restaurant by the pool as well.
reviews.title: Terrible experience

reviews.text: Room overlooking slums with terrible smell.
reviews.title: Complete and utter dump!

reviews.text: Very noisy all night (thin walls)
reviews.title: Noisy and poor service, okay location.

reviews.text: Tap dripping all night couldnt stop it.
reviews.title: Not bad, very very noisy at the front. Nice pool area tho

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Dang Derm for 4 nights during early December. The location of the hotel is excellent, fronting directly onto Khao San Road. Although this is great for accessibility, it means that it's very noisy at night, so not ideal for light sleepers or young children.
reviews.title: Good for its price

reviews.text: The room we stayed in was nice and contained all the essentials - a shower (not great jet, but did the job), toilet, basin, mattress on the floor (no bed base), television, air conditioning and a small balcony. The room was very spacious, with more than enough room for suitcases.
reviews.title: Right in koaSan road. Clean spacious rooms, pool and breakfast included. Noisy at night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is an infinity pool located on the top of the hotel which is beautifully clean, large and surrounded by deck chairs with a bar nearby. This is a very nice place to relax during the heat of the day.
reviews.title: Nice Rooms, Not So Great Reception Staff

reviews.text: The breakfast is ok, although lacking variation - every morning we had the option of choosing spaghetti, toast, eggs, fruit and cereal. Coffee and juice (read: cordial) were also available).
reviews.title: Avoid - not a 3-star hotel

reviews.text: Overall, the hotel was very hygienic and customer service was adequate. I would recommend this hotel to travellers who are looking for somewhere clean and comfortable, but nothing fancy. Also, only stay here if you don't mind noise at night.
reviews.title: Horrible noise you are going to a place u won't sleep.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location right on the Khaosan Rd but obviously that makes it quite noisy, particularly if you get a room at the front. We did, but were warned about the noise on check in and found it fine once we wore ear plugs. The room itself was very spacious, pleasantly decorated and clean. The rooftop pool is a great spot to escape the madness and heat of Bangkok. We paid 1,150 Baht per night including breakfast, which I thought was good value considering all of the above.
reviews.title: Good value, great location

reviews.text: Stayed here for three nights in feb, the location was perfect however this is Khaosan road so don't expect it to be quite although saying that we didnt find it noisy considering. The pool is great to escape from the stifling heat and the food up there is quite good! The breakfast is okay too simple but it's enough to keep you going. Overall we enjoyed our time here and will stay again on our way home
reviews.title: Handy location whilst passing through bangkok

reviews.text: A lot nicer than where our friends were staying. Great blinds on doors to block out the light. Almost slept through the first day. Water can be temperamental. Hot cold hot cold. WiFi can be slow. Pool area is lovely, with towels available. Well priced advert clean, with room cleaned when requested. Fresh towels, fresh bed sheets. What you'd expect. Hotel is very clean overall. Never made it up for breakfast but is available, Khao San rd, makes you nocturnal so I'd be shock to see anyone there in a morning. Unless they were on there way home from being out.
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel twice. Last year for two and this year for three nights. The main reason for chosing it was its perfect location if you want to be in the middle of Khaosan Road. We enjoyed very much its rooftop terrace with a pool, which offered perfect relaxation after a long day spent on foot. The biggest problem for me was very loud noise coming from the street until early morning hours. This year we asked for a quiet room when we made a reservation, but there obviously aren't any. It was impossible to sleap without earplugs. There is also a strong smell of humidity in the room, and we had to keep the window open during the night to get some fresh air. We also liked buffet breakfast, which is included in the price. It is served quite early, from 7am to 9am and we overslept it on the first day.
reviews.title: Take your earplugs if your wish to sleep

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: arrived in Bangkok and came straight to the hotel, fantastic location but was bit concerned by grubby entrance but once in the hotel it is lovely.
reviews.title: all things considered it was good.

reviews.text: The location is great, right in middle Khaosan Road, lots of night activity. Good value, rooms are big, spacious, walk in shower and bed on floor. Yes you can hear street bars. But we really enjoyed staying here. Be sure to go up on the rooftop pool area at night.
reviews.title: Right in middle Khaosan Road

reviews.text: It has a pool, a nice pool but we couldn't use it due to maintenance. So we had to use the hotels over the road.
reviews.title: Good location, not so good rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room are clean but fairly basic for the money you pay. No bed bases just mattress on the floor. Big bath room tho.
reviews.title: Good location in Khao San

reviews.text: Fantastic location but does get noisey at night.
reviews.title: Great location, reasonable price, rude staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff at front desk are rude particular one with the funny eyes. He just looks evil ans has an attitude to match.
reviews.title: BED BUGS Yet No Refund
